name: CP range type
description: HL7 Standard Tables - Tables defined by the HL7 organization. Most tables in this category are related to the standard and its message structures.

values.description: Flat-rate. Apply the entire price to this interval, do not pro-rate the price if the full interval has not occurred/been consumed
Pro-rate. Apply this price to this interval, pro-rated by whatever portion of the interval has occurred/been consumed
